events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills listed.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to assist you throughout the interview process.
The initial screening call was successful, and the recruiter was pleased with your technical knowledge and communication skills.
You responded promptly to the interview invitation and expressed enthusiasm for the Software Engineer role at our company.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th, where you will be evaluated on coding challenges and system design.
